bio: Someone messed up and blended Jibanyan and Komasan together. City smarts meet rustic charm!

soultimate.name: Swirly Nyanball
soultimate.description: Use a pale blue flame to hit foes with big damage.

skill.effect: Absorbs fire damage and recovers 30% of it as HP.
skill.name: Friendly Fire

name: Jibakoma
